Line in C/C++-General: $(SolutionDir)External\SFML\include
Line in Linker-General: $(SolutionDir)External\SFML\lib

Lines for Linker-Input (Release):
sfml-graphics.lib
sfml-window.lib
sfml-audio.lib
sfml-network.lib
sfml-system.lib

Lines for Linker-Input (Debug):
